section.subtitle: Ever Story Master Has a Story
section.description: Every day a writing prompt is released, you write a story and submit to enter.

section.subtitle: Unleash your creativity
section.description: Traditional pen and paper writing is never out of style. Show us what you've got!

section.subtitle: Vote for your favorite stories
section.description: You can read other's submission and vote for your favorite one! Winners are announced daily!
